Name: Concrete link beam, conventionally reinforced, aspect ratio between 2.0 and 4.0, beam < 16" wide and depth < 30"

DamageStates.Description: Residual crakcs no greater than 1/16 inch.  Cracks are mainly at the beam to wall interface, some limited flexural cracking.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Epoxy inject crakcs (200 to 240 inches in length).

DamageStates.Description: Residual cracks greater than 1/8 inch and minor spalling of concrete.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Epoxy inject crakcs (600 to 720 inches) and slab (300 inches), replace spalled concrete.

DamageStates.Description: Significant strength degredation (<0.8Vn), buckling or fracture of diagonal reinforcing, crushing of concrete.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Chip away damaged concrete, attached mechanical couplers to the diagonal bars still embeded in the wall, replace damaged or fractured reinforcing.  Replace damaged concrete.
